requirements.plaintext: Talk to Santon and kill creatures described by him
requirements.markdown: Talk to Santon and kill creatures described by him

steps.text: Talk to ◀Santon▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Santon▷ located south of ◀the Palace of Alcazarzaray▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Palace_of_Alcazarzaray▷.
Kill the 3 fierce creatures in any order
Gator Raja — Oversized Gator: In a lake located east of ◀Sumeru City▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sumeru_City▷.

Sumpter Beastlord — Giant Blockading Sumpter Beast: In a cave located southeast of the ◀Spire of Solitary Enlightenment▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Spire_of_Solitary_Enlightenment▷ domain, and southwest of ◀The Chasm▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Chasm_(Area)▷'s ◀Statue of The Seven▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Statue_of_The_Seven▷. Upon approaching its location, Paimon will remark that the Sumpter Beastlord should be nearby.

Rishboland Raja — Alleged Child-Napper, Rishboland Tiger: Place <img:fowl> ◀Fowl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fowl▷ ×1 in the plate next to the Notice located southwest of the ◀Steeple of Ignorance▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Steeple_of_Ignorance▷ domain, then change the time to between 21:00 and 03:00.
